course_title: Topics In Computer Science: Information Security
class_notes: This course will cover topics on information security including authentication, access control, cryptography, vulnerability detection, threats to security, and control mechanisms to address such threats. Students will also learn principles of information assurance at the policy, procedural, and technical levels.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - W301
sections: Class Nbr: 6051, Section #: 5, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Pouriyeh, Status: Open
